item.title: Post 83 on corner of Parkhill and Hust road opposite war memorial is out., 7th November
item.description:
Post 83 (which is not on the map so cannot be selected) Lamp out at night on corner of Parkhill and Hust road opposite war memorial. Seen sat 4th October 22.30 and 6th Nov 18:45. what3word location ///cotton.rapid.shirts. Reported under 8254203 more than 4 weeks ago. Still not fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bexley High Street, Bexley, London

item.title: North end of College Lane, just north of the tunnel, 7th November
item.description:
You recently repaired the knocked over bollard after i reported it. But obviously not sufficiently well, as it has been damaged again. Now presenting a hazard to pedestrians, particularly in the dark. Again my photo will not upload for an unknown reason.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Lane, Dartmouth Park, London

item.title: 113 Park Lane outside Aston Martin showroom, red sign ref. Crossrail needs removal as street clutter, 7th November
item.description:

item.description:
